name: European Confederation of Inclusive Enterprises
legal: Association sans but lucratif - non profit organization
membership:
Member of EASPD
Working with EWETA (Belgium), UNEA (France), CONACEE (Spain), BAG-IF (Germany) also member of CEFEC.
goal:
Social entrepreneurship through inclusive enterprise.
Our vocation:
1- Represent, promote and develop the inclusive business model.
2- Increase and promote universal European law guaranteeing employees with disabilities compensation for their reduced capacity to work, without discrimination, limitation or quota restrictions.
3- Develop and promote a universal European right for employees of inclusive enterprises to have access to permanent employment for an indefinite period of time in order to promote the realisation of professional projects in the ordinary labour market.
=> To build an inclusive society
=> To be an integral part of the European 2020-2030 strategy for people with disabilities
interests: Budget, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
Employment for people with disabiities
Inclusive Enterprises
Training
Social Enterprenership
